mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EDSM_SAMPLE_T ( SAMPLE_DOT_CODE, EMP_CODE, SAMPLE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME, USE_YN, SAMPLE_TITLE ) VALUES ( #{sampleDotCode}, #{emp.empCode}, #{sampleContent}, CURRENT_DATE, CURRENT_DATE, #{useYn}, #{sampleTitle} )
mapper.select: SELECT SAMPLE_DOT_CODE, SAMPLE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME, USE_YN, SAMPLE_TITLE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SAMPLE_DOT_CODE) AS RN, SAMPLE_DOT_CODE, SAMPLE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME, USE_YN, SAMPLE_TITLE FROM EDSM_SAMPLE_T) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

update.foreach: INTO EDSM_SAMPLE_T ( SAMPLE_DOT_CODE, EMP_CODE, SAMPLE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME, USE_YN, SAMPLE_TITLE ) VALUES ( #{sampleDotCode}, #{emp.empCode}, #{sampleContent}, #{createDatetime}, #{modifyDatetime}, #{useYn}, #{sampleTitle} )

mapper.select: SELECT SAMPLE_DOT_CODE, SAMPLE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATETIME, MODIFY_DATETIME, USE_YN, SAMPLE_TITLE, EMP_CODE FROM EDSM_SAMPLE_T WHERE SAMPLE_DOT_CODE = #{sampleDotCode}
